channel.title: Josh - efak - unmasked
channel.description:
If you don't know what efak is, this does not concern you. I thought it would be the right thing to do to show some people who josh from efak really was(If you were someone who donated, you have been scammed). He is extremely greedy, I don't know why I even decided to do what I did for him. He paid me 2m(his idea, to "motivate" me) to code the server recently, and then closed efak because he thought I wasn't coding (I was). A picture is worth a thousand words (J~T) = josh, aaron = me
[img]http://img211.imageshack.us/img211/7577/joshdk8.jpg[/img] the last little bit is a quote from him in the conversation earlier, saying that "everyone knows i'm a scammer"
efak has moved to http://rlnbase.com/ <- josh has no power over this forum

item.title: Josh - efak - unmasked
item.dc:creator: @Smegman Smegman
item.description:
@Smegman wrote:

[quote=“RLN, post:26, topic:31277”][quote author=sppt link=topic=45599.msg561142#msg561142 date=1165124040]
ok i talked to Pyru, one of the admins there, this is what he told me:

Dustin says:
he didn’t scam anyone… rln is lying
well josh just said that to rln because rln took 15m rs2 cash from josh to work on the server
and didnt finish it…
so josh just said it to him to piss him off
i was the person people were sending the donations too, 50$ was basically the only donation
and it went to hosting and irc
with the adds, i dunno where that money went

RLN on irc:

[quote] [RLN] o right, i made up logs
[/quote]
he said more but you gotta ask him, since i cant make a difference between crap and truth :\

[/quote]Ok what reason do I have to lie? Pictures don’t lie… im just posting what Josh told me on msn. Josh GAVE me 2m, I don’t see how he got “15m” or how i “scammed him” since he gave me 3 days, how can you finish the server in 3 days? And again, I don’t know if he was lieing, I’m just posting what he said.

and this:

[quote=sppt]RLN on irc:

[quote] [RLN] o right, i made up logs
[/quote][/quote]
thats bullshit, i said that as sarcasm… its way out of context
[/quote]
IM IN DA PICTUR

Read full topic

item.title: Josh - efak - unmasked
item.dc:creator: @thorpe thorpe
item.description:
@thorpe wrote:

Haha, my names thorpe :P… Um I’m not josh though… this guys a scammer burn him in hell

Read full topic

item.title: Josh - efak - unmasked
item.dc:creator: @RLN RLN
item.description:
@RLN wrote:

[quote=“sppt, post:28, topic:31277”][quote author=RLN link=topic=45599.msg561173#msg561173 date=1165124348]
Ok what reason do I have to lie? Pictures don’t lie… im just posting what Josh told me on msn. Josh GAVE me 2m, I don’t see how he got “15m” or how i “scammed him” since he gave me 3 days, how can you finish the server in 3 days? And again, I don’t know if he was lieing, I’m just posting what he said.

and this:

[quote=sppt]RLN on irc:

[quote] [RLN] o right, i made up logs
[/quote][/quote]
thats bullshit, i said that as sarcasm… its way out of context

[/quote]

ok ty for clearing up a bit more, and i agree, 3 days is WAY too short.

  • i do not know who’s telling the truth, only two ways to discover is: lie test or torture(bwahahaha!)

edit:
i just remembered that someone discovered that Josh was logging IRC pm’s and shit, that gets me a bit suspicious…[/quote]he was, i got screenies of that too

Read full topic

item.title: Josh - efak - unmasked
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

RLN has pointed out to me that Josh did explicitly state that donations were going to devs and server costs and shit… so yeah, he’s a scammer.

I can’t say I’m surprised though, and I wouldn’t have given him any money.

Read full topic

item.title: Josh - efak - unmasked
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

dbzmaster555:

What is efak I just wanna know. sorry for being nosey I am just curious.

I’m pretty sure eFak was the community dedicated to creating a fully featured RuneScape Classic Private Server or something like that. I cannot remember exactly what though…

Read full topic

item.title: Josh - efak - unmasked
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“RLN, post:7, topic:31277”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=45599.msg556185#msg556185 date=1165050185]
But a donation is not a guarantee of the cause.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 02, 2006, 03:02:00 AM[/size][hr]Oh… he posted his adsense in the IRC for the last month too, and it was nowhere near 250.
[/quote]Yes it is a guarantee, if its not going to the proper cause, then its a scam. Its like saying your gonna take donations for a million starving children, then hoarding it all.
Idk what he made, I just posted what he said.[/quote]

Which those charities do indeed do - they don’t need a brand new landrover every month.

Read full topic
